title: you tube video is broken
content: اقا یا خانم محترم درود من وصل نمیشوم موزیلا پسورد میخواد درست میدم میگه اشتباه فایر فاکس میخواد درست پسوردرومیدم میگه اشتباه است سه یاچهارشب هست که نمیخوابم که راه اندازی کنم میگه اشتباه است لعنت به ایران که ما توش زندگی میکنیم هزینه اینترنت که نگو فیلتر شکن که نگو وای از این دزدیهای اینها
creator: alirezahamtay

title: YouTube Pausing when Switching Tabs
content:
Hello,

For years I've been able to watch a video in one tab and open a new tab. I could hear the video playing while I opened a new tab. Suddenly today the video pauses as soon as I click away to a NEW tab.

Oddly enough, if I have any other tabs already opened, when I first click on one of those, I can then open a new tab without the video pausing. It's only if I go directly from a YouTube video (that's already playing) that it pauses when trying to open a new tab. Odd.

Why is this happening? and so suddenly? At least I have a work around but this is so weird.

Any ideas out there?

Thanks, Andre'a


BTW - Is "Settings" the best topic? or should I've chosen something else (like Performance)?
creator: DreaSpirit

title: Firefox Tabs not re-opening after Restart
content: Over the past several days, Firefox has been randomly shutting down. When reopened, my previous tabs have disappeared. While setting up my laptop on a docking station today, I had to reboot several times. Every time it reopened my previously opened tabs are gone. Yes, I have Settings set to re-open Firefox with previously opened tabs. It has worked beautifully for me for years. Does anyone know what is going on? What I can do?
creator: ScruffysMom

title: FIrefox will not open links correctly in any emails (gmail)
content: When I click any link in an email (gmail) firefox refuses to take me to the site. Instead I get error messages like error 404 or most recently, the attached which was from a link in an email from my doctor. I opened the same link using brave no problem. I have uninstalled and reinstalled firefox a few times. I have deleted all plug ins. I can open every single one of those links and any other links in brave or any other browser. Not firefox. This is frustrating. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: wenfarrow

title: Rufus popup appears at bottom left of laptop screen duriong all shopping.

title: Aliexpress.us
content: Aliexpress.us will not load - Firefox cannot/will not redirect. Cleard cookies/catch, etc.- put exception for website in privacy. No change. Safari loads website just fine. Any ideas? OSX 15.2
creator: citraulics0

title: Three leading slashes '///' when clicking a mailto: url
content:
Hi! Since lately (can't pinpoint it precisely), I have the following problem: Whenever I click on a mailto url, it opens Thunderbird but inserts the mail with three leading slashes.

These are not present in the url itself and also I don't get them when I right click -> copy mail address. From Gnome Web or Chromium, this does not occur.

I'm on Firefox 132.0 and Fedora 41. If you need more information, I will happily provide them.

Best regards, Carroll
creator: carroll.diehl
